name: ESP Ra.De.
overview: A Collaboration between M2 and original creator Junya Inoue to revive the 1998-released arcade shoot ’em up. The complete port adds improvements such as new mode, new visuals, and new voice-overs. ESP Ra.De. Psi follows the story of three children that possess wonderful abilities. The game brings players to the skies of 2018 Tokyo in an effort to avoid wasting town from psychic Miss Garra and her extremely competent army.
